subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: An increase in the number of no-hitters this season in the major leagues has refocused the attention of some on Dock Ellis’s 1970 gem, which he said he threw while on LSD.
snippet: An increase in the number of no-hitters this season in the major leagues has refocused the attention of some on Dock Ellis’s 1970 gem, which he said he threw while on LSD.
